RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foa ls Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MITESSE broke in full stride to set all the pace, turned back a strong bid from the runner up nearing the top of the stretch and proved best under strong handling. TIME FOR CUPID was bumped at the start, chased the early pace, bid two wide nearing the quarter pole but couldn't handle the winner. MAY BEAU saved ground and went evenly. O K BABY chased the early pace two wide and was through after a half. DREAM TO WIN stumbled outward bumping TIME FOR CUPID at the start and was no factor. EASTER PRIDE was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: O K Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: May Beau
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Dream to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased, loomed boldly, 2 wide 1/4 pole, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Mitesse
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, repulsed bid, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Easter Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Fo als Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILENCING vied for the lead three wide into the stretch, surged under left handed urging late and proved best by the narrowest of margins. LEWD stalked the pace into the stretch, dug in four wide under left handed urging and just missed. FIONA saved ground for a half mile, was guided five wide entering the stretch and closed a gap late. ROSE KNOWS dueled for the lead two wide into the turn, edged clear, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. SKY dueled for the lead along the inside and weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fiona
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground 1/4 pole, guided 5 wide, late gain,

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Knows
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, led, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Silencing
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, long drive, all out, left handed urging,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pope McLean, Marc McLean & Pope McLean Jr.

ENTRY.NAME: Lewd
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, closed left handed urging, 4wide, just missed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 41500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 20 Allowed 4 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TO WIN was restless in the gate, hopped at the start, closed willingly inside rivals and was along in time while all out. TANTRUM was bumped at the start, settled close up, drew closer in the six path in upper stretch, had to avoid the fallen rivals just past the eight pole, dug in gamely and just missed. MOBIL SOLUTION also restless in the gate, was allowed to settle, altered course sharply inward past the eighth pole to avoid the fallen rival and improved position for a minor share. ALTISSIMO was fractious in the gate, broke alertly to gain a narrow lead into the clubhouse turn while drifting out to the five path, gave up the lead before a quarter, chased the pace into the stretch, also altered course sharply to avoid the fallen rival past the furlong marker then dropped back. HOPPY GILMORE bore out at the start bumping TANTRUM, dropped back to trail before a half and avoided the fallen rival past the furlong marker. MORESTRIDE broke alertly then was hung wide into the clubhouse turn by ALTISSIMO, regained the lead in the six path before a quarter, set the pace into the stretch, suffered a catastrophic injury just past the furlong marker, fell and was euthanized. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Altissimo
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, 5path first turn, chased, avoided fie 1/8pole

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, avoided fallen foe 1/8pole, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Hoppy Gilmore
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, dropped back, trailed, avoided foe 1/8p

ENTRY.NAME: To Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, hopped start, closed willingly, inside rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Tantrum
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, close, bid 6path, avoided fallen foe, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Morestride
ENTRY.COMMENT: hung wide first turn, set pace, injured past 1/8pole,fell,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 39. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOSEY POWER unhurried early, closed rapidly four wide through upper stretch, made the lead near the sixteenth pole under left handed urging and drew off. COLOR BEARER bumped at the start, sped to the lead along the inside, set a pressured pace through the turn, shook clear in upper stretch, maintained his advantage until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. RAISE YOU ONE saved ground and went evenly. MY TICKET trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals. MY HOMBRE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. MARQUITOS M stalked the pace from the five then four path and was through after a half. WHY KENNY WHY bumped at the start and was no factor. MOMENT IN THE DARK pressed the pace three wide into the stretch then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Raise You One
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Why Kenny Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Color Bearer
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, set pressured pace inside, shook clear, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Nosey Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed willingly 4 wide, drew off, left urging

ENTRY.NAME: My Hombre
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: My Ticket
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Moment in the Dark
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, stopped lane

ENTRY.NAME: Marquitos M
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 5-4paths, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Purse 32500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 20 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (O hio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SECRET FIX away alertly, set all the pace while getting quick fractions and widened at will through the stretch under left handed urging to win as much the best. RED HOT LASS with the second flight two wide, moved up in the four path through the second turn and finished second best. MARKET SUCCESS trailed into the far turn then had a mild late rally in the four path. TIZ INDEPENDENCE well placed, failed to respond. PURITY chased the winner into the far turn, stopped abruptly in upper stretch, pulled up past the furlong marker and was walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Independence
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Fix
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set fast pace, widened at will, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, middle move, 4path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Purity
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, stopped upper stretch, pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Market Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, mild rally late 4path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE JANUARY 20, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claim ing Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: K P SILVER BULLET trailed inside, closed fast splitting horses two wide in upper stretch to gain a narrow lead at the furlong marker, drifted out to the five path and proved best under strong handling. PAT DADDY allowed to settle, rallied through the stretch five wide and just missed. TUFF ATTACK close up from the start, loomed boldly four wide into the stretch then was outfinished. DIAMONDS ENJOY pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and faded late. UNCAPTURED PULSE set a pressured pace along the inside until mid stretch and weakened late. EXONERATED PREZ failed to menace. VALIANT THOR pressed the early pace three wide and gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, loomed boldly 4 wide upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: K P Silver Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, split horses 2 wide upper stretch, drifted 5p, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Pulse
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Diamonds Enjoy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Exonerated Prez
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Valiant Thor
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, gave way turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late rally 5wide, just missed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEER CHASER broke in front then gave up the lead briefly on the first turn, regained the advantage before a quarter, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch while drifting out to win as much the best. STRIKE APPEAL four wide into the first turn, loomed boldly two wide before a half, chased the winner the balance of the trip and finished second best. COMPLY gained a narrow lead briefly on the first turn, dropped back on the second turn then came on again late in the four path. SO DIALED IN checked behind rivals on the first turn, stalked the pace three wide then lacked the needed response. SURF AND TURF was no threat. FRANCO had good early speed along the inside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Comply
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead, dropped back 2nd turn, came again stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Surf and Turf
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Franco
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: So Dialed In
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked first turn, stalked 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Beer Chaser
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, headed first turn briefly, set pace, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Strike Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, 2w, bid 1/2 pole, chased, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROWDY DAISY broke outward, made the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and drew clear in the stretch under mild urging to win as much the best. LADY GIULIANA close p in the three path, swung wide, rallied in the eight path and got up for second. MANGORITA allowed to settle, finished determinedly for a minor share. BELLAVALENCIA bore out at the start, pressured the winner two wide for six furlongs and weakened late. WELLOILEDCAT was no factor. TIPARILLO showed little. WHAT KNOT had good early speed along the inside, got out, dropped out of it on the far turn, was eased to the wire and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiparillo
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Giuliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: close 3path, rallied 8path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: What Knot
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, got out, eased to wire, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Welloiledcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Mangorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, finished determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Rowdy Daisy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, set pace, drew off, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Bellavalencia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out start, pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened late
